messages.body: Nasdaq notches record close as shares of $AAPL Apple and $AMZN Amazon jump to new highs      https://www.cnbc.com/2018/06/04/us-stocks-set-to-add-to-gains-after-fridays-strong-jobs-report.html

links.title: US stocks set to add to gains after Friday's strong jobs report
links.description: U.S. stock index futures pointed to a higher open Monday, after a jobs report that topped expectations sent equities rallying in the previous session. At around 7 a.m. ET, Dow Jones industrial average futures rose 135 points, indicating a higher implied open of 128.79 points.
